name: Madness Path
description:
You are in a randomly generated maze, with 3 fragments of the key scatter around somewhere, but you are not alone, the beast roams the maze and knows it well, try to be quiet to aboiv him, while you find your way out of that hell.

Use some weapons scatter in the maze, like daggers, or get the broken sword pieces to and anvil to defend yourself and to slow the beast, but you can't kill it.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
E - Interactions
Mouse click - Atack with any weapon equipped

This is the first release, various features are coming for future updates including a mobile version.
